items.title: Anxiety over government shutdown pushes consumer sentiment down to near-record low

items.title: These bonds are the next bearish bet to make on the AI space, says Bank of America
items.description: Stay long risk assets for now, advises Hartnett, but short hyperscaler bonds and go long zero-coupon bonds as a hedge against recession.
